膩.definition: greasy; soft; unctuous; intimate; tired of

膩味.definition: tired of; fed up with; sick of; (of a person) to annoy; to be tiresome

膩子.definition: putty (same as 泥子); frequent caller; hanger-on

膩歪.definition: (of a couple) to be sweet to each other; lovey-dovey; tired of; fed up with; sick of (synonym of 膩味|腻味[ni4wei5])

膩煩.definition: bored; to be fed up with; sick and tired of sth; Taiwan pr. [ni4 fan2]
